Ingredients.2: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.5: 2 slices processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)

Ingredients.6: 0.5 cup crushed potato chips, or as needed

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes. Drain.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Combine mushroom soup, milk, and tuna in a saucepan over medium heat; cook until well blended and warmed through, about 5 minutes. Pour mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish; add noodles and mix well. Top noodles with cheese food and sprinkle potato chips over cheese.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes.
